BudgetAllocation.name: BudgetAllocation
BudgetAllocation.description: Represents a subsection of a Budget that shows where allocated resources are being applied.

Amount.description: The total amount of allocated funds.

BudgetCategoryValueId.description: The budget category value that's associated with the grants allocation.

BudgetId.description: The budget that this allocation is related to.

FundingDisbursementId.description: The funding disbursement associated with the budget allocation.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.

Name.description: A descriptive name for the allocation.

Quantity.description: The total quantity amount allocated for non-currency projects.

Status.description: The status of the budget allocation.
